subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers, clinging to the final playoff spot in the East, beat the Devils behind two goals from Ryan Callahan, one each from Derek Stepan and Taylor Pyatt and a 26-save performance from Henrik Lundqvist.
snippet: The Rangers, clinging to the final playoff spot in the East, beat the Devils behind two goals from Ryan Callahan, one each from Derek Stepan and Taylor Pyatt and a 26-save performance from Henrik Lundqvist.
